transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, hi sir, very good morning.
Customer: Good morning, main bol raha hun.
Executive: Uh, sir Meenakshi Sharma this side from IndiaMART head office.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Yeh bhi Lab Electronics mein baat ho rahi hai, right? Owner baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Main bol raha hun, boliye.
Executive: Uh, actually sir aapka na concern raise hua tha IndiaMART ke pe. Aap I think apne account manager jo Mr. Rahul hain unse connect kar rahe the sir. I think kuch review rating ke regarding aapka concern tha.
Customer: Jab bhi mere ko problem hota hai uska response hi nahi aata, main kya hi bolun. Isse pehle jo mera account manager tha woh best tha. At least jab bhi mere ko kuch problem hota tha uska solution milta tha mere ko.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Koi baat nahi sir agar aapka yeh concern hai toh.
Customer: Main aapko whatsapp, maine whatsapp pe already uh aap dekh sakte hain aapka jo uh whatsapp hai na jo 9696 bolke kuch hai usme ek screenshot bheja tha.
Executive: Okay. Uh, main shayad 16 ya 17 October ko maine unko message kiya tha. Unka reply aaya tha shayad 23 ya 24 tarikh ko.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Mr. Rahul ka, right? Uh uske baad phir maine shayad uh uh ek kal nahi Saturday ko shayad, Saturday ko shayad aap logo ka office close rehta Saturday Sunday ko.
Executive: Hmm, ji, ji.
Customer: Saturday ko main jab yeh unko call kar raha hun nahi uthaya toh pata chala ki office close rehta hai. Toh maine unko whatsapp pe hi likha tha.
Executive: Achha ji.
Customer: Uske pehle bhi maine message kiya tha please call me urgent call karke.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Toh reply shayad unko raat ko aa raha tha shayad 11 ya 12 baje ke aas paas aa raha tha. Ab bataiye 11 ya 12 baje main free rahunga unse baat karne ke liye.
Executive: Ji sir, main samajh rahi hun uske liye bhi aapko humne call kiya connect kiya hai. Agar Rahul ji response nahi kar rahe hain toh uske liye hum apni side se sorry karte hain. Mera jo previous jo account manager tha uska naam main bhool raha hun. Uh woh job chhod chuke hain.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Uh yes sir. Woh jo pehle wale account manager the woh left ho chuke hain company se.
Customer: Okay. Haan ji. Agar usi ke jaisa agar koi hai toh mujhe uh wohi provide kar dijiye. Woh best tha. Kya naam Atif naam tha shayad uska. Atif naam ka.
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir woh toh abhi hai nahi IndiaMART pe. Jahan tak rahi dekhiye Mr. Rahul ki baat actually woh thoda sa busy hain abhi family mein thoda sa health issue unka chal raha hai toh woh abhi office join nahi kar rahe hain. Right? Is vajah se unhone aapko response nahi. Haan ji.
Customer: Uh.
Customer: Uh koi problem nahi. Mujhe dusra account provide kar dijiye phir.
Executive: No problem sir isi ke liye maine aapko connect kiya hai. Main hi aapko connect karungi filhal jab tak Rahul ji available nahi hain office mein. Toh aapke paas yeh mera number hai agar koi bhi aapka concern ho aap direct mujhe connect kar lijiyega. Agar Rahul ji bhi aapke call ka response nahi de rahe. Theek hai? Toh aap mujhse call kar lijiyega direct.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Right? Haan ji. Toh aapne yeh kaha tha. Haan ji haan ji sir mera yahi number hai Meenakshi Sharma naam hai mera.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay. Uh aur yeh jo aapne sir yeh concern apna raise kiya tha like aapke koi customer hain jinhone I think aapko rating. Mere kuch customer hain. Uh problem kya hua tha na abhi raat ko mere paas call aa nahi raha. Main try kiya tha bahut baar uh baat karne account se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Woh call response nahi kar rahe hain. Uh lagbhag more than six to seven times maine apne number se try kiya maine apne office ke number se try kiya lekin woh response nahi kar rahe hain. Maine whatsapp pe details bhi bheja. Uh woh shayad uh unfill kar rahe hain. Lekin jab main IndiaMART check kar raha tha na lagbhag four ya five five times unka call aaya hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Call attempt option aata hai wahan pe. Lekin mere paas call aaya hi nahi. Na mere paas aaya na mera jo dusra number hai uh hai usme bhi call nahi aaya hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Toh IndiaMART se aapki I think baat bhi hui hai na regarding customer care pe aapne bhi call kiya tha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Toh unse connect hua unka customer ka?
Customer: Uh woh shayad call nahi kiye the customer ko.
Executive: Achha unhone nahi kiya. Okay no problem. Aapka agar yeh concern hai toh ek baar main unse connect karti hun personally. Theek hai? Unse main baat karti hun.
Customer: Kyunki unhone seedha one star deke chala gaya woh.
Executive: Achha. Abhi baat bhi nahi kar raha hai. Ab one star dena kis reason se diye. Pata nahi chal raha hai woh.
Executive: Yeh Rehan Salwar Mewati wale ki baat kar rahe hain aap right?
Customer: Haan wohi hai.
Executive: Wohi hai. Okay. Theek hai theek hai. Main ek baar khud personally unse ek baar connect karti hun sir. Aur main aapko iska update karti hun apni side se theek hai?
Customer: Please.
Executive: Haan ji aur aap yeh mera number save kar lijiye. Aapko kuch bhi issue ho koi bhi problem ho mujhse connect kar lijiye.
Customer: Mujhe whatsapp pe hi message kar dijiyega.
Executive: Sure sir sure main aapko message dal deti hun.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer not receiving calls at night.

- Account manager not responding to messages promptly.

- Customer gave one star rating without explanation.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the inconvenience.

- Executive will personally connect with the customer.

- Executive provided her contact number for direct communication.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- customer care, account manager, call response, rating
